Craftsmen like boil down to this idea or it'll never get fixed at all but if

there's separation of concerns whether you've written enough tests whether the quality is there none of those things

important piece of software wisdom that many of you might have heard of before because this lots of people say this if
you're not embarrassed of your first version you waited way too long to ship that product
you should be embarrassed of that code when it goes out to customers if you're not embarrassed then you're just
screwing around over engineering it's really hard to get this your head
around this especially if you spent time in big corporate teams because everything about your old life will tell

that first time that first time you sit down and you just hack something together and it's just a one file
